con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.date == "2016-09"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.date.get(0) == "2016-09"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.date == "2016-10"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.date.get(0) == "2016-09" assert slurperresponse.date.get(1) == "2016-10"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.date.size == 1
